si.title: බදුකරණයට එරෙහිව කෙන්යාවේ අරගලය
body_lines: කෙන්යානු ජනතා අරගලය රාජද්රෝහී ජනමාධ්ය නිමිත්තක් ලෙස විස්තර කිරීම ගැන ජනාධිපතිවරයා ආඩම්බර විය.

en.title: Struggle in Kenya against taxation
body_lines: The president was proud to describe the Kenyan people's struggle as it was a culmination of treason.

summary_lines: Kenya faces a tough battle against high taxes, which the president labels as a heroic resistance akin to treason.
